column2: Since the unification ceremony, some of your Mansterian retainers have been discussing ways to bring the people of the realm closer together. One suggestion was that you adopt a few Thracian customs and study some of their fighting styles.
We have much to learn from each other.
The spirit of reunification has taken hold in the county of [Root.GetName]. The local culture now reflects habits and traditions from north and south Thracia.
They are truly New Thracians now.
The Grann people in various regions are slowly developing unique local identities with distinctive customs. The county of [Root.GetName] is the latest to adopt new traditions.
